Name: Melee Weapon
Description: Close-combat weapons that lean on raw strength or fighting skill.

Name: Blade Weapon
Description: Edged weapons that synergise with BladeMelee capabilities.

Name: Ranged Weapon
Description: Firearms and distance weapons that interact with a gang's Ranged capability.

Name: Armor
Description: Protective gear that bolsters defense or survivability when equipped.

Name: Miscellaneous Equipment
Description: Utility items such as medical, stealth or support gear that does not occupy weapon or armor slots.
